law.catch_line: On request of the Commissioner, the Attorney General may proceed in a State or federal court or befo...
law.text:
On request of the Commissioner, the Attorney General may proceed in a State or federal court or before any other federal unit:
to enforce a decision of the Commissioner under this title;
subject to § 3-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article, to collect a civil penalty that is assessed by order of the Commissioner under this title; or
to enforce any other order of the Commissioner under this title.
